description.narrative: This report provides a detailed overview of the workshop delivered as part of the 2019 collaboration between One Young World and the Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs at the One Young World 2019 Summit. The workshop is called: The Future of Work.

activity-date.narrative: The workshop was given on this date.

recipient-country.narrative: The workshop is delivered in London, for different nationalities.

sector.narrative: Butterfly Works provided the workshop at the 2019 One Young World Summit

title.narrative: OYW Future of Work Co-creation workshop

description.narrative: This report provides an overview and the main outcomes of the co-creation process facilitated by Butterfly Works for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands on the theme “The Future of Work” The activities were conducted with youth leaders before and during the One Young World summit 2019 in London.

title.narrative: Part of the Annual Report Conference Delivered
This is a report on the workshop that was held during the One Young World 2019 Summit
